Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

"Sir, The Rimnicon have been extinct for over 3,000 years. Apparently there 
has been a ship here from a war of evolution, the one the autobots and 
deceptacons grew from. Sir, if this ship is still in tact, we could use the 
genetic signature for our own forms, Kind of like an ancient update."

--part1_4e.1504613e.2b21fe47_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
